meta.title: CEMEDIS - Dental & Medical Centers in Île-de-France
meta.description: CEMEDIS - Network of dental and medical centers in Île-de-France. 25 centers, quality dental care, dental emergencies. Book online.

hero.title: Our profession, Your health
hero.subtitle: CEMEDIS brings together teams of passionate professionals in 25 dental and medical centers. Quality care, accessible to all, close to you.
hero.searchPlaceholder: Search for a center by city or address...

services.title: Complete care for the whole family
services.subtitle: From prevention to specialized care, our teams support you at every stage of your oral health journey.

dentalCare.title: Dental Care
dentalCare.desc: Consultations, scaling, cavity treatment, devitalization and all common dental care.

aesthetics.title: Cosmetic Dentistry
aesthetics.desc: Whitening, veneers, invisible aligners for a radiant and harmonious smile.

implants.title: Implantology
implants.desc: Dental implant placement by experienced specialists to restore a complete smile.

pediatrics.title: Pediatric Dentistry
pediatrics.desc: Child-friendly care in a reassuring and caring environment.

surgery.title: Surgery
surgery.desc: Extractions, bone grafts and periodontal surgery by specialized practitioners.

emergency.title: Dental Emergencies
emergency.desc: Rapid care for emergencies: pain, trauma, infections.

whyUs.title: Excellence at the service of your smile
whyUs.subtitle: For over 20 years, CEMEDIS has been committed to providing quality care in a modern and welcoming environment.

certified.title: Certified Teams
certified.desc: All our practitioners are qualified and regularly attend training to stay at the forefront of techniques.

modern.title: Modern Equipment
modern.desc: Our centers are equipped with the latest technologies: digital radiology, 3D scanners, dental lasers.

availability.title: Availability
availability.desc: Extended hours, online booking and emergency service to meet your needs.

payment.title: Pay for your care in installments
payment.subtitle: Thanks to our partnership with Alma, pay for your dental care in 2, 3 or 4 interest-free installments. A simple and accessible solution to take care of your smile without impacting your budget.
payment.imageAlt: Pay in installments with Alma - 2x 3x 4x interest-free

testimonials.title: What our patients say
testimonials.subtitle: Thousands of patients trust us every year.

review1.text: Excellent care for a dental emergency. The team is professional and reassuring. I highly recommend!
review1.name: Mary P.

review2.text: Modern and clean center. My dentist takes the time to explain each procedure. Very satisfied with my care.
review2.name: John D.

review3.text: I've been bringing my children for 3 years. The team is patient and gentle with them. They're no longer afraid of the dentist!
review3.name: Sophie L.

cta.title: Take care of your smile today
cta.subtitle: Find the nearest CEMEDIS center and book an appointment in a few clicks.

footer.desc: Network of dental and medical centers in Île-de-France. Quality care, accessible to all, close to you.

emergencies.title: Dental Emergencies
emergencies.subtitle: Dental pain, trauma, infections... Our centers welcome you for rapid care.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Have a question? Don't hesitate to contact us.
contact.name: Name
contact.success: Your message has been sent successfully.
contact.error: An error occurred. Please try again.

joinUs.title: Join our teams
joinUs.subtitle: Are you a healthcare professional? Join the CEMEDIS network.

reimbursements.title: My Reimbursements
reimbursements.subtitle: Everything you need to know about dental prosthesis reimbursement

success.title: Payment Accepted
success.message: Your payment was successful. Thank you for your trust. A confirmation email will be sent to you shortly.

denied.title: Payment Declined
denied.message: Your payment could not be processed. Please check your bank details and try again. If the problem persists, contact your bank or our team.
